content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 4 times 2 to the power of open parentheses 3 plus x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> can also be expressed as which of the following?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="32 plus 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>32</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="32 times 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>32</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="32 plus 8 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>32</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="512 times 8 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>512</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="32 times 2 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mn>32</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
